00033 #ifndef CONTROLLER_INTERFACE_CONTROLLER_BASE_H
00034 #define CONTROLLER_INTERFACE_CONTROLLER_BASE_H
00035 
00036 #include <ros/node_handle.h>
00037 #include <hardware_interface/robot_hw.h>
00038 
00039 
00040 namespace controller_interface
00041 {
00042 
00049 class ControllerBase
00050 {
00051 public:
00052   ControllerBase(): state_(CONSTRUCTED){}
00053   virtual ~ControllerBase(){}
00054 
00060   virtual void starting(const ros::Time& time) {};
00061 
00067   virtual void update(const ros::Time& time, const ros::Duration& period) = 0;
00068 
00074   virtual void stopping(const ros::Time& time) {};
00075 
00079   bool isRunning()
00080   {
00081     return (state_ == RUNNING);
00082   }
00083 
00097   virtual bool initRequest(hardware_interface::RobotHW* hw, ros::NodeHandle &n,
00098                            std::set<std::string>& claimed_resources)=0;
00099 
00101   void updateRequest(const ros::Time& time, const ros::Duration& period)
00102   {
00103     if (state_ == RUNNING)
00104       update(time, period);
00105   }
00106 
00108   bool startRequest(const ros::Time& time)
00109   {
00110     // start succeeds even if the controller was already started
00111     if (state_ == RUNNING || state_ == INITIALIZED){
00112       starting(time);
00113       state_ = RUNNING;
00114       return true;
00115     }
00116     else
00117       return false;
00118   }
00119 
00121   bool stopRequest(const ros::Time& time)
00122   {
00123     // stop succeeds even if the controller was already stopped
00124     if (state_ == RUNNING || state_ == INITIALIZED){
00125       stopping(time);
00126       state_ = INITIALIZED;
00127       return true;
00128     }
00129     else
00130       return false;
00131   }
00132 
00134   virtual std::string getHardwareInterfaceType() const = 0;
00135 
00137   enum {CONSTRUCTED, INITIALIZED, RUNNING} state_;
00138 
00139 
00140 private:
00141   ControllerBase(const ControllerBase &c);
00142   ControllerBase& operator =(const ControllerBase &c);
00143 
00144 };
00145 
00146 }

00148 
00149 #endif
